panels.description:
Registration rates of new identities over the reference period and a shorter period to determine the current rate.
Additionally, the threshold rate is also shown. Whenever the current rate is higher than the threshold rate, a captcha needs to be solved for new identity registrations.
panels.title: Registration Rates / Captcha Threshold Rate

panels.description: Bounce rate on the II landing page. The bounce rate (in this case) is the ratio of (IP addresses that visited the page but made no authenticated action) / (all IP addresses that visited the page). Data is aggregated in 1h time buckets.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
WITH
    'https://identity.ic0.app' AS ORIGIN,
    ('prepare_delegation', 'get_anchor_info', 'register') AS RELEVANT_ACTION,
    page_load_ips as
    (
    SELECT DISTINCT toUInt32(toStartOfHour(date)) * 1000 as t, remote_addr_hashed
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND http_origin == ORIGIN
    AND ic_method_name == 'http_request'
    GROUP BY t, remote_addr_hashed
    ),
    action_ips as
    (
    SELECT DISTINCT toUInt32(toStartOfHour(date)) * 1000 as t, remote_addr_hashed
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND http_origin == ORIGIN
    AND ic_method_name IN RELEVANT_ACTION
    GROUP BY t, remote_addr_hashed
    )
SELECT t, num_no_action / num_page_loads as bounce_rate
FROM (
         -- the number of unique IPs that performed a page load but no relevant action within a certain hour
         SELECT t, count(DISTINCT remote_addr_hashed) as num_no_action
         FROM page_load_ips LEFT JOIN action_ips ON page_load_ips.remote_addr_hashed == action_ips.remote_addr_hashed
         WHERE action_ips.remote_addr_hashed == ''
         GROUP BY t
     ) as no_action_count  INNER JOIN
     (
         -- the number of unique IPs that performed a page load or a relevant action within a certain hour
         SELECT t, count(DISTINCT remote_addr_hashed) as num_page_loads
         FROM
             (
                 SELECT t, remote_addr_hashed
                 FROM action_ips
                 UNION DISTINCT
                 SELECT t, remote_addr_hashed
                 FROM page_load_ips
             )
         GROUP BY t
     ) as all_count ON no_action_count.t == all_count.t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
WITH
    'https://identity.ic0.app' AS ORIGIN,
    ('prepare_delegation', 'get_anchor_info', 'register') AS RELEVANT_ACTION,
    page_load_ips as
    (
    SELECT DISTINCT toUInt32(toStartOfHour(date)) * 1000 as t, remote_addr_hashed
    FROM default.http_access_important_canisters
    WHERE date >= toDateTime(1681719983) AND date <= toDateTime(1684311983)
    AND http_origin == ORIGIN
    AND ic_method_name == 'http_request'
    GROUP BY t, remote_addr_hashed
    ),
    action_ips as
    (
    SELECT DISTINCT toUInt32(toStartOfHour(date)) * 1000 as t, remote_addr_hashed
    FROM default.http_access_important_canisters
    WHERE date >= toDateTime(1681719983) AND date <= toDateTime(1684311983)
    AND http_origin == ORIGIN
    AND ic_method_name IN RELEVANT_ACTION
    GROUP BY t, remote_addr_hashed
    )
SELECT t, num_no_action / num_page_loads as bounce_rate
FROM (
         
         SELECT t, count(DISTINCT remote_addr_hashed) as num_no_action
         FROM page_load_ips LEFT JOIN action_ips ON page_load_ips.remote_addr_hashed == action_ips.remote_addr_hashed
         WHERE action_ips.remote_addr_hashed == ''
         GROUP BY t
     ) as no_action_count  INNER JOIN
     (
         
         SELECT t, count(DISTINCT remote_addr_hashed) as num_page_loads
         FROM
             (
                 SELECT t, remote_addr_hashed
                 FROM action_ips
                 UNION DISTINCT
                 SELECT t, remote_addr_hashed
                 FROM page_load_ips
             )
         GROUP BY t
     ) as all_count ON no_action_count.t == all_count.t
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Bounce Rate on https://identity.ic0.app

panels.description:
Number of active identities in the past 24h, updated every 24h.
All authenticated actions are counted as activity.

panels.title: Days until internet identity becomes full

panels.description:
Page sizes of the various different virtual stable memories that Internet Identity is using:

Unmanaged:
- header memory, limited to 1 page

Managed:
- identities: unbounded
- archive_buffer: limited to 128 pages (1 bucket)
panels.title: Internet Identity Virtual Memory Page Sizes

panels.description: Number of registrations that are allowed before the registration rate limit kicks in.
panels.title: Registration Rate Limit Burst Reserve
